RelatedSentence: A 16 - year - old student was caught on camera shoving a teacher in Texas because of a confiscated cellphone .
The video shows 66 - year - old Beverly Round , a substitute teacher at Nimitz High School in Houston , in an argument with the un-named teen , according to a report from KXAN .
The altercation caught on a cellphone camera left Round on the floor .
Officials with the Aldine Independent School District say the student was arrested by campus police and charged with injury to the eldery .

For Round 's part , she says she 's fine .
